name: Knight An'dae
description:
Play as Knight An'dae and fight your way to the evil Lord Loarde by going through several regions and fighting their inhabitants.

Controls:

Attack by clicking or pressing space bar and pointing cursor in direction you wish to attack. (A mouse is recommended)

Can also attack by using the arrow keys.

Movement with WASD

Change weapon hitting TAB and selecting a weapon, or use the scroll wheel on a mouse, or use the number keys 1-4.

ESC to open the menu.

Authors: Mark Tillman, Jared Rosen, Samuel Mayer, Ian Fredericks
